DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether difference corneal epithelial healing rate and/or toxicity follow pterygium excision , eye treat post-operatively moxifloxacin ( VIGAMOX ) versus gatifloxacin ( ZYMAR ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Moxifloxacin Versus Gatifloxacin Corneal Epithelium Following Pterygium Excision
DOC.criteria: 1. diagnosis primary pterygium clinical indication surgery 2. informed consent 1. know allergic reaction fluoroquinolones . 2. secondary\recurrent pterygium clinical suspect conjunctival tumor . 3. eye surgery last 6 month . 4. eye disorder : severe dry eye syndrome , ocular surface disease , glaucoma , recurrent corneal erosion , chronic corneal disease , chemical burn . 5. low compliance . 6. pregnancy
